description: These sweet potato black bean cups have a nice Mexican flavor them!
name: Sweet Potato Black Bean - Make Ahead Savory Baked Oatmeal Cups
recipeIngredient: 4 cups old fashioned rolled oats, gluten free certified if necessary
1 flax egg (1 tablespoon ground flax mixed with 2 1/2 tablespoons water, let sit 2-3 minutes)
1 (15 ounce) can black beans, drained and rinsed
1/2 cup thinly sliced green onion or green chiles (optional)

recipeInstructions.text: Pre-heat oven to 375 degrees F. Grease a muffin tin or line it with parchment or silicone liners.
In a large bowl, mix together the oats and the rest of the dry ingredients.
Add the milk and flax egg and mix until combined.
Next, mix in the sweet potato, black beans and green onion or green chiles.

Use a 1/4 cup scoop to scoop the oat mixture into the muffin tin. Bake cups until cooked through and firm, about 20 â€“ 23 minutes. Let sit in the muffin tin for about 10 minutes before transferring to a wire rack to cool.
